callCenter.title: Call Center
callCenter.intro: Welcome to Active People’s Call Center page. Our professional, friendly, and well-trained call center team are waiting to assist you with essential advice in making the right decision for loan services; should it be about loan requirements, terms and conditions, or our location.
callCenter.hoursPrompt: Please call us during our business hours:
callCenter.closing: We endeavor to answer your queries as soon as possible.

complaint.title: Customer Complaint
complaint.intro: We have set up telephone lines and e-mail to offer solutions to all your complaints:
complaint.details: You may also submit a written complaint to any of our branches during operation hours (Monday–Friday, 8:00 am to 5:00 pm). We offer a solution within 2 days for verbal complaints and 30 days for written complaints. All claims will be kept confidentially.
